mapper.select: SELECT PAYMENTNUM, PAYMENTPRICE, TO_CHAR(PAYMENTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') PAYMENTDATE, PAYMENTSTATUS, USERID, ROOMNUM, A.PENSIONID, ROOMNAME FROM TBL_PAYMENT A JOIN TBL_ROOM B USING(ROOMNUM) WHERE A.PENSIONID = #{pensionid}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PAYMENT (PAYMENTNUM, PAYMENTPRICE, USERID, ROOMNUM, PENSIONID) VALUES (#{paymentNum}, #{paymentPrice}, #{userid}, #{roomNum}, #{pensionid})
